# Load libraries and functions

```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(cowplot)
library(bio3d)
library(penm)
library(jefuns)


# source functions
source("plot_enm.R")
```


# Set up parameters

```{r}
enm_param <- lst(model = "ming_wall", "d_max" = 10.5, frustrated = FALSE )
str(enm_param)
```


# Read and perform ENM NMA of wild-type protein


## Set up Elastic Network Model

```{r}
## read pdb filec
pdb_file <- "data/2acy_A.pdb"
pdb <- read.pdb(pdb_file)

# initialize prot object 
prot <- prot_sc(pdb) #note I could use prot_ca or prot_sc here

# add enm stuff
prot <- init_prot(prot = prot, 
                model = enm_param$model, d_max = enm_param$d_max, frustrated = enm_param$frustrated)
                
str(prot)
```



### Calculate prot energy

```{r}
enm_energy(prot)

```


## Plot and compare msf


```{r}
plot_msf_site(prot, d_max = param$enm$d_max)
```

## Plot normal-mode matrix

```{r}
plot_umat2(prot)
```

## Plot a few normal modes
  
```{r}
nmodes <- max(prot$enm$mode)
plot_modes(prot, plot_modes = c(1, 2, 3, 4, nmodes - 3, nmodes - 2, nmodes - 1, nmodes))
```
